That is the same as saying that the Probability of A is the same whether or not B occurs, i.e. P[A|B] = P[A]. E.g. given two dices, A is throwing first dice even, and B is throwing the second dice odd. One has no impact on the other. A is throwing a dice even, and B is throwing a (the same) dice odd.
